amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Transportation Security Administration for the Behavior Detection Officer program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Transportation Security Administration for the Behavior Detection Officer program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 280 (Roll no. 205).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 280 (Roll no. 205).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Thompson (MS).
